DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess single dose Diclofenac potassium ( 0.5 mg/kg ) effective single dose Acetaminophen ( 10 mg/kg ) reduction fever 2 hour , treatment febrile child acute upper respiratory infection . This comparative double blind , double dummy , randomize study effectiveness Diclofenac potassium versus Acetaminophen febrile child acute upper respiratory tract infection . The patient randomize either group : Group A ( Diclofenac potassium ( 0.5 mg/kg ) Group B ( Acetaminophen ( 10 mg/kg ) ) . A Health Care Professional train measure temperature 2 hour . During study period , parent legal representative invite fill survey habit knowledge regard fever management home .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Diclofenac Potassium Versus Acetaminophen Febrile Children With Acute Upper Respiratory Tract Infections
